definitions.definition: That which is permanent or invariable .
A quantity that remains at a fixed value throughout a given discussion.
Any property of an experiment, determined numerically, that does not change under given circumstances.
An identifier that is bound to an invariant value; a fixed value given a name to aid in readability of source code .

main_definition: That which is permanent or invariable .
secondary_definitions: ( algebra ) A quantity that remains at a fixed value throughout a given discussion.
( sciences ) Any property of an experiment, determined numerically, that does not change under given circumstances.
( computing ) An identifier that is bound to an invariant value; a fixed value given a name to aid in readability of source code .
